name: za-fake-id-number-generator
title: South African Fake ID Number Generator
description: Quickly generate South African ID numbers for testing, this will create a valid fake ID number and copy it to your clipboard.
author: runningdeveloper

commands.name: za-id-number
commands.title: Copy ID Number
commands.subtitle: South African Fake ID Number Generator
commands.description: Create a fake South African ID number and copy it to your clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
